mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEMBER_BAND MB ON(M.MID = MB.MID) JOIN BAND B ON(B.BID = MB.BID) JOIN BOARDS BO ON(MB.BID = BO.BID) AND (MB.MID = BO.MID) WHERE M.MID = #{ imid } AND BO.BSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BO.BOARDID, M.MID, B.BID, B.BNAME, BO.BCONTENT, BO.BSTATUS, BO.BDATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEMBER_BAND MB ON(M.MID = MB.MID) JOIN BAND B ON(B.BID = MB.BID) JOIN BOARDS BO ON(MB.BID = BO.BID) AND (MB.MID = BO.MID) WHERE M.MID = #{ imid } AND BO.BSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT M.MID, B.BID, B.BNAME, MB.ISTATUS, MB.IDATE, P.EDIT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEMBER_BAND MB ON(M.MID = MB.MID) JOIN BAND B ON(B.BID = MB.BID) JOIN PROFILE P ON(P.BID = B.BID) WHERE M.MID = #{ imid } AND ISTATUS != 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_BAND SET ISTATUS = 'N' WHERE MID = #{mid} AND BID = #{bid}
